back_flavor: Chiaki Asami lived with his parents in an unstable country on the brink of rebellion. Just a child, he was forced to watch as the ensuing chaos stole his family from him. Forming a small group with refugees including Akira Hojo, he attempted flee the country. Only the two of them had survived by the time they reached the new world of Arkham. Chiaki was disgusted by the state of society when he saw the broken city. He vowed to take the political reins of Arkham and steer it towards a brighter future. Criminals, the corrupt, or even the abyss itself be damned.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Seeker cards ([survivor]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, Spirit and Insight cards level 0. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Referendum, On Borrowed Time, 1 random basic weakness.
name: Chiaki Asami
text: [reaction] When an investigator plays an event at your location: Reduce the cost that event by 1. If that event was an Insight card, draw a card. (Limit once per round) [elder_sign] effect: +1. You may shuffle a card from your hand into your deck. Then, draw a card. I'll keep this city going even if I have to rebuild it from the ground up.

name: Referendum
text:
While you have 10 or more events in your discard: The ability below is [free].
[action]: Reveal an event to investigator at your location. They play that event as if it was in their hand. If they trigger Chiaki Asami's "[reaction]" this way; they may draw a card instead of him (limit once per round).

flavor:
"Just what kind of man is he? How can
he walk around with a smile on his face?"
name: On Borrowed Time
text: Peril. Hidden. Revelation Secretly add On Borrowed Time to your hand. Forced At the end of the investigator phase, if you played at least 2 event cards this round: Take 2 direct damage. Each investigator at your location takes 1 horror. Discard On Borrowed Time.

name: depricated (Sleepless Nights)
text: Revelation - If Foresight has less than 3 supplies; shuffle Sleepless Nights into your deck. Otherwise, put Sleepless Nights into play in your threat area. Foresight's "[free]" ability can only be used once per round. At the end of your turn: take 1 horror damage for each supply on Foresight (Max 2 horror). If Foresight has no supplies on it discard this card.

back_flavor: Jack had always had a knack for getting people what they needed, and for a low enough price to raise eyebrows. As he moved from job to job, he found that he could help people who were in too deep, but only if he was willing to take on the burden himself. His debt grew with each person he saved, and so did the shadiness of his activities. Eventually, he found the police knocking on his door, so he fled into the depths of Arkham. These days, Jack can be found in dark alleys, making deals that the police could hardly imagine, to pay off his most recent debt.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, and Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-2. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 3 copies of Family Bonds, 2 copies of Prying Eyes, 1 random basic weakness.
name: Jack Myers
text:
Anytime a card enters your hand, place it as the right most card of your hand (Your choice of order for multi-card draws).
[reaction] When you play the left most card in your hand; Reduce the cost of that card by 1 for every 3 other cards in your hand (Limit once per round).
[elder_sign] effect: +1, if you succeed; draw a carc and you may move a card in your hand up to 3 positions to the left or right.

name: Family Bonds
text:
Fast. Jack Myers Deck only.

Family Bonds does not count towards your maximum hand size. Ignore Family Bonds when determining your left most card in hand.
Move a non-weakness card in your hand up to 2 positions to the left or right. Draw a card. Shuffle this card into your deck (limit 2 played per round).

name: Prying Eyes
text: Discard all cards in your hand that were left of Prying Eyes before it was played. Forced While Prying Eyes is in your hand: Increase the cost of the first card played at your location each round by 1. Forced At the end of your turn: move Prying Eyes one position to the left.

back_flavor: Akira Hojo lived with his father who worked as a doctor in a dangerously unstable country. When the chaos erupted, it toke everything from him. He gathered together other suffering children to survive. With Chiaki Asami and few others, he fled the country. Only he and Chiaki managed to survive the journey. When he reached the safety of Arkham, he was met with by a dark, warped city. He decided he would reform the criminal underbelly of Arkham. He vowed to turn these gangsters into a force that could protect Arkham from the anything, be it man or monster.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5, and up to 15 Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-X where X is the number of tallies marks under Hojo's rank minus 2(max level 3). Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 1 Burning Ambition, 1 Occupational Hazard, 1 random basic weakness. Before drawing your opening hand: Set aside Burning Ambition. After Mulligan, shuffle Burning Ambition into the top 10 cards of your deck (top 5 cards if there are at least 6 tallies under Hojo's rank).
name: Akira Hojo
text: [reaction] When you perform a Fight action, spend 1 resource: Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this attack. If you succeed by 2 or more, you gain 1 resource (Limit once per test). [elder_sign] effect: +1. If this skill test causes an enemy to be defeated; gain 3 resources.

flavor:
"Why did you become a gangster?"
"Because you can do in a single day..."
name: Burning Ambition
text: Akira Hojo deck only. Fast. Uses (0 supplies). [reaction] After you pay any cost for a card effect, place 1 supply on Burning Ambition. Forced When there are at least 7 supplies on Burning Ambition: Search your bonded cards for Rite of Passage and swap it with Burning Ambition.

flavor: "...What it takes an ordinary man thirty years to do."
name: Rite of Passage
text: Bonded (Burning Ambition). Permanent. Forced After Rite of Passage enters play: Record 1 tally mark under “Hojo's Rank” in your Campaign Log. You get +1 [agility]. [reaction] After you succeed a skill test by 3 or more, exhaust Rite of Passage: Play an event card from your hand (paying its cost).

name: Occupational Hazard
text: Revelation Put Occupational Hazard into play in your threat area. Forced At the end of your turn take 1 damage. If an ally is defeated this way, take 2 horror and discard Occupational Hazard.

back_flavor: The people around Alma always met gruesome fates. As an orphan, whenever she got close to others, they would suffer. As she grew older, she realized that she was the source of their misfortune, and their deaths. Distraught, she wandered into the depths of Arkham, and there she found them. People who didn't care that she was a cursed existence, because they were already doomed. She stood up for these hapless souls. Wouldn't let anyone look down on them. Her compassion earned her their loyalty, and the vow to find the source of their damnation until their final breath.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Non-UniqueAlly cards level 0-5. Survivor cards level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, and up to 5 other Guardian cards level 0. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 2 Vagrant Messenger, Inevitable Fate, 1 random basic weakness.
name: Alma Venandi
text: You have an additional ally slot that can only be used to hold non-unique allies. Investigators at your location and connecting locations may: Assign damage and/or horror to Ally assets you control. Use [action], [free], and [reaction] abilities on Ally< assets you control. ([reaction] abilities that does not cause the card to exhaust may only be used by 1 investigator per round.) [elder_sign] effect: +1. You may return an Ally asset from your discard pile to your hand.

flavor: "While the city quietly left us to die, she kept us going. We will do our part to end this damnation.
name: Vagrant Messenger
text:
Alma Venandi's deck only.

Enemies at your location have -1 evade.
[free] Exhaust Vagrant Messenger and deal 1 damage to it: Move to Alma Venandi's location.

flavor: "It's happening again! I'm sorry. I'm so sorry..."
name: Inevitable Fate
text: Revelation Place Inevitable Fate into play in your threat area. It costs Investigators an additional action to leave your location. [action] Discard an Ally asset controled by Alma Venandi: Discard Inevitable Fate.

back_flavor: During every age, terrors would try to invade the world. While most of humanity remained unaware, William was there, holding the final line between the world and the forces outside it's understanding. From place to place, age to age, whenever the tides of madness began, he was there, waiting. Sometimes, he wonders if he holds back the chaos, or if his birth marks the start of the apocalypse.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Mystic cards ([Mystic]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, cards that "cancel" level 0-3, and up to 5 other seeker cards ([Seeker]) level 0. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Future Foretold, Star Spawn, 1 random basic weakness.

text: [Cc]ancel

name: William Grindwell
text: [reaction] Forced Whenever your deck is empty and you have at least 7 cards in your prophecy deck: Move the cards from the prophecy deck to your deck. [reaction] When you reveal a token with a non-negative modifier during a skill test: Add your [elder_sign] token's modifier and effect to that token for this test. (Limit once per skill test). [elder_sign] effect: +2, reveal another token If you succeed, draw a card. After this skill test ends, you may move the top 2 cards of your deck to the bottom of your prophecy deck.

flavor: "For in that moment, we shall be as gods."
name: Future Foretold
text: William Grindel's deck only. Fast. Play at the start of the round. Until the end of the round, investigators get +1 [willpower], +1 [intellect], +1 [combat], +1 [agility], and may take an additional action during their turn. Forced Whenever Future Foretold would enter your discard, move it to the top card of your prophecy deck instead.

name: Star Spawn
text: Location farthest from all investigators. Hunter. After an investigator reveals an [eldersign] or [auto_fail] symbol during a skill test: Star Spawn attacks them (regardless of their location).

name: Lily McBride
text: XXXX

name: All Cards
text: text
